name: TMS-Twisted Mirror Shooter
description:
This game was developped in less than 48h for the 2022's Global Game Jam with "Duality" as a theme.

In TMS, your spaceship rotate around a central point, yet training drones rotate in mirror and in sync with you.

Try your best to take the drones down while dodging their and your shots !

All the inputs are given on the first screen and the rules are simple enough.
